Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Stroller \Stroll"er\, n. One who strolls; a vagrant. [1913 Webster]

stroller n 1: someone who walks at a leisurely pace [syn: {saunterer}, {ambler}] 2: a small vehicle with four wheels in which a baby or child is pushed around [syn: {baby buggy}, {baby carriage}, {carriage}, {perambulator}, {pram}, {go-cart}, {pushchair}, {pusher}]
